name: 1 Percent - 1% Puzzle
description:
1 PERCENT - 1% PUZZLE is about tapping the adjacent tiles with the same number. It sounds simple, doesn’t it? However, only 1% of players can get to the number 11. Which number can you reach? Come play 1 PERCENT - 1% PUZZLE. Take challenge and practice mindfulness throughout your day.

Find the same number of colourful tiles and combine them to grow up.

Optimised for not only adults but also children, 1 PERCENT - 1% PUZZLE is an ideal game environment to teach your kids how to do math as well as to train their brains to focus, calculate and think strategically.

Just enjoy it!

HOW TO PLAY:
Tap the adjacent tiles with the same number, and they will merge in the position you tap. Try to get 11, or even higher!

1 PERCENT - 1% PUZZLE FEATURES:
· Endless gameplay
· Easy to play, challenging to beat 11 goal
· Simple and colourful design
. Able to choose Default or Piano sound effects
· Leaderboards access
· Share your score with friends
. Applicable and playable on both iPhone and iPad
